content: --कारः, --कृतं, --कृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} blowing into. {2} hissing, whizzing. {3} the hiss of a serpent. {4} sobbing. {5} screaming, a loud shriek, yell.
--कृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} blown into &c. {2} blown up (as a bubble.) {3} screamed aloud. (--तं {1} the sound of a wind-instrument. {2} a loud cry, shriek, scream.
